thread.section_title: LensDirect Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of LensDirect | lensdirect.com | 2 of 40
thread.title: Michelle

author: Michelle
title: Michelle
text: I had seen my optometrist days before and wanted more colored contacts. LensDirect prices were very competitive and better than my doctor office. After placing my order, a confirmation and a follow up email from Mike was sent. They made sure my information was correct and verified which is very profesional! Within days my contacts arrived, sooner than my doctor office clear lenses! I WILL order again in the furture.
